item.title: VILLA DEWATA I
item.description:
VILLA DEWATA I

This beautiful 4 bedroom villa is hidden away in a side lane in the heart of fashionable Seminyak and has a large private swimming pool in its walled garden full of tropical plants. The living/dining area has large glass doors opening to the swimming pool and garden.

item.title: VILLA DEWATA II
item.description:
VILLA DEWATA II

This beautiful 5 bedroom villa is hidden away in a side lane in the heart of fashionable Seminyak and has a large private swimming pool in its walled garden full of tropical plants. Each rooms are air conditioned, the living/dining area has large glass doors opening to the swimming pool and garden.Â
